name: Son of Aral
description:
Son of Aral is a 3D Tower defense/Sandbox game.

You're lock inside a fake sky and an island under your feet,you have to destroy the enemy's portal with turrets to expand this island,when the island is big enough and happy, it will give you the key to get out in return.



Core Gameplays:
Collect: chop trees, mine stones and ores.



Craft: build furnace, turrets, walls, tools, new technology and all kinds of other items.



Survival: protect the island's core, plant seeds and water crop, cook with furnace.



Tower defence: build turrets to defend enemies, block enemy's path by putting walls, upgrade your technology to unlock better turrets.
